experience.second-job-description: I teach tricks, tips and analysis of products that help you in your day to day life, all in the form of videos for YouTube.
experience.last-job-description: Computer maintenance of the ABC (Automated Border Control) equipment used by the National Police Force for the identification of persons at border entry and exit control.

hobbies.hobbie-text: I am a fan of outdoor and indoor cinema and series, so much so that I have a projector to have a better experience.
